subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning to help Oakland beat the Dodgers. Quintin Berry slapped a base hit through the drawn-in infield to give the Tigers a win.
snippet: Yoenis Cespedes hit a three-run homer in the ninth inning to help Oakland beat the Dodgers. Quintin Berry slapped a base hit through the drawn-in infield to give the Tigers a win.
